name: Arthur J. Gallagher & Co.
description: Arthur J. Gallagher & Co. is a global insurance brokerage and risk management services firm. Founded in 1927 by Arthur J. Gallagher, the company has grown to become one of the largest insurance brokerage firms in the world, serving clients in various industries, including healthcare, construction, and manufacturing. Gallagher offers a wide range of services, including property and casualty insurance, employee benefits consulting, and risk management solutions. The company is known for its commitment to client service and its ability to provide tailored solutions that meet the unique needs of its diverse clientele. With a presence in over 30 countries, Gallagher leverages its global reach and local expertise to deliver comprehensive insurance solutions. The firm also focuses on innovative approaches to risk management, utilizing advanced analytics and technology to help clients navigate complex insurance landscapes. Gallagher's dedication to integrity, respect, and professionalism has established it as a trusted partner for organizations seeking to protect their assets and manage their risks effectively. The company's mission is to provide exceptional service and unparalleled expertise to enhance the financial security and success of its clients.

seo.meta_title: Arthur J. Gallagher & Co. | Global Insurance Brokerage and Risk Management
seo.meta_description: Explore Arthur J. Gallagher & Co., a leading global insurance brokerage firm providing innovative risk management solutions and exceptional client service.

faq.question: What services does Arthur J. Gallagher offer?
faq.answer: Arthur J. Gallagher offers a range of services including property and casualty insurance, employee benefits consulting, and risk management solutions.

faq.question: Who is the CEO of Arthur J. Gallagher?
faq.answer: J. Patrick Gallagher, Jr. is the CEO of Arthur J. Gallagher & Co.

faq.question: Where is Arthur J. Gallagher headquartered?
faq.answer: Arthur J. Gallagher is headquartered in Itasca, Illinois, USA.

faq.question: When was Arthur J. Gallagher founded?
faq.answer: Arthur J. Gallagher was founded in 1927.
